website_summaries.verdict: A unique design that effectively tackles tough clogs, even in low-flow toilets.
pros: Flexible rubber plunges and returns to initial shape without splashing
Cleans well after use, leaving no dirty water inside the bell
cons: Has trouble fitting in square toilet openings

customer_reviews.title: Excalibur
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most amazing plunger I have owned. I know it is somewhat silly, but having a reliable plunger such as this becomes such a relief when the world of human waste becomes less than...well, "manageable." I promptly named mine Excalibur.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As an engineer, I am deeply moved.
customer_reviews.text: As an engineer, I am deeply moved. This plunger does not look like much but it generates an incredible seal and suction. In three pumps it resolved a problem that I had spent literally hours on with a standard plunger. To the nameless engineer who sat down and thought about how a plunger should be and then proceeded to design and build the hell out of it, god bless you.
customer_reviews.author: K. Liang

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Work for Elongated Toilet Bowls
customer_reviews.text: While the product description claims that this plunger works for all toilet bowl shapes, it didn't work for our elongated toilet bowl. It left so much gap and let air escape in time of need. This product seems to be made for small round toilet bowl. I wish I can return the product if I can but now I just have to trash it and buy a new one. Please save your money if you have elongated toilet bowl.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Luddite

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be writing a glowing review of a plunger, but this one is that good! Relative to the other plungers I have used, this one works with ease and with 1 push. The others I have used have either been too rigid and didn't move enough to work or too flimsy and didn't have any power. Fortunately I have only had to use this twice, but both times I was shocked at how easy it worked! The handle is also very sturdy. I do wish it came with a container for it to sit on, but hopefully it won't be too hard to find one. I will be ordering more for each bathroom in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: This product came bent in half
customer_reviews.text: This product came bent in half. Absolutely garbage. It must be made of extremely cheap material because the handle was literally bent in half. The picture is how it came out of the box. Extremely unsatisfactory and I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Rajan Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Sucks for the wrong reasons
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful with this plunger, but it wasn’t a good fit. While it claims to fit several dimensions, I found that with our toilets, once it gets to the broader ring, you’ve lost a lot of air to plunge. So you’re working harder for 75% less compressed air. In addition, the aluminum handle may offer some benefit but overall feels flimsy. The hollowness feels like it could give if you really plunged hard. I’d be more concerned with what caused the extra muscle power, however. Maybe no more Taco Bell.
customer_reviews.author: Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Plunger doesn't fit outlet opening
customer_reviews.text: The plunger fits poorly to the outlet opening. There are 3 steps below the half sphere/dome top portion in the plunger The last step is 1/2 inch tall and is 4 inches in diameter. My old 5 dollar cheapo 1950 design has a single 4 inch diameter tapered neck that's almost 2 inches compared to the half inch of this "all angle" thing. It works on the flat drain in the tub but not where it's needed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward F Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Poor design for square throat toilets.
customer_reviews.text: Weird design, doesn't fit square(ish) throat toilets. Description boasts excellent conformity to oddly shaped toilet bowls. Not so true.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and effective plungers!
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly good plungers! I agree with some of the other reviewers that these could use some rubberized strips or ridging down the length of the shafts to keep your hands from slipping if they were to get wet, but they are long enough and don't require much effort at all to break up clogs. They didn't seem to make very good seals with the toilet when I first used them, so I was dubious, but they break up clogs better and faster than any I have ever bought at grocery or hardware stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tonkinese Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: While this is called heavy duty it is not on my opinion. On first use I found it very weak and the rubber plunger is like a wet noodle and works as well as that. I ended up buying another plunger available at Ace Hardware for $7 called the Harvey's Bell Funnel plunger which is both heavy duty and very effective
customer_reviews.author: R. P.

customer_reviews.title: Total crap!
customer_reviews.text: I do wish I could give this ZERO stars. The second time that I used it, the rubber cracked near the handle rendering it a waste of money and a reason to be pissed off. Of course, it is out of the timeframe for return because the toilet plunger is something that you rarely use – or rather, hope to rarely use. Don't buy. It's a POS and I'm not sure why other reviews are positive.
customer_reviews.author: SAME

customer_reviews.title: Warning - will not work on all toilets
customer_reviews.text: If the hole in the toilet is oval (see pic) don't get this. It won't seal properly.
customer_reviews.author: BB Q

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know a toilet plunger could be this good
customer_reviews.text: I have ten kids, and it seems like a common Dad job is clearing a clogged toilet. I was tired of carrying a plunger through the house, so I bought this pair. The reviews seemed good...for a reason. The one I already had works, and I have had worse. I have never used ones as good as these, though. They work like great, much faster at getting the job done and with less effort. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough!
customer_reviews.text: I personally like the wooden handled ones better because they feel stronger, but I was ready to update to fit my bathroom decor and not that of a farmhouse. This plunger does the job, but I feel like the strength of the metal is cheap and couldn't take a good old fashioned steadfast plunging. Good enough, but glad I haven't had to use it much. The handle is shorter than the wooden ones which makes it easier to hide behind my trash can. I do like the rubber part better than the one I had with the wooden handles, which is why it works as good but without the harder plunging I required of the old fashioned one.
customer_reviews.author: LaineyBell

customer_reviews.title: Got a used plunger !!! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: the rubber is all rusty and the product is scratched up...... some piece of rubber on the bottom r chipping off I DO NOT BUY......
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best new secret!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 57 year old woman who has been in pursuit of a reliable plunger for years!! I’ve been through so many, constantly disappointed, constantly frustrated. If I had a dollar for every time I got splashed with s**t water I’d be a rich woman. I stumbled on this plunger as I was searching through Amazon and took a chance after reading some reviews. Can I just say it’s freaking AWESOME!! It doesn’t splash. It doesn’t turn inside out. It does not require perfect placement. It’s lightweight and easy to push. It fits inside my old plunger holder for storage! This plunger is my best secret new tool of the year!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said after the fist use: "That plunger will flat sure get it! Just hit it 3 or 4 times and everything is gone! Order another one for the other bathroom!" So I did. When I read the product description before I bought the first one, I laughed heartily. It very carefully described what would happen. Thankfully, it was truthful and accurate. Buy it! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Holy sh.., this thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have the unfortunate tendency to clog up toilets all the time. Embarrassing, really. And all this time I've been struggling with lame plungers. I thought I had a good one, but dear Lord, this one is so much better. After my latest clog, I rolled up my sleeves, ready for a 10 minute humiliating battle against the blockage. Instead, it took me five plunges! The plunger has a huge range of in-and-out action and fit the drain perfectly. Thank god. Blocked toilets are an issue of dignity and this plunger allowed me to reclaim some of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic new high-tech toilet plunger
customer_reviews.text: This new design plunger is by far the finest I have ever used my life. Since I am a health not that consumes a lot of fiber and also a detoxification green powder drink, I leave extremely ample sized deposits in the toilet. Plus I have a new toilet bowl also. I consistently clogged this new toilet bowl including my sisters new toilet bowl. I always had to call the superintendent to come with the snake in order to fix the problem. This time I used the new plunger, and in less than one minute, the clog was quickly eliminated.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Madonna

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that fits my Kohler toilet
customer_reviews.text: Who writes a review of a plunger? I have tried several other plungers and they all seem to gap in the bowl rendering them totally ineffective. Worse, if they happen to sort of 'fit', they flip over and don't allow me to actually plunge. I have a 6 year old who uses half a roll of paper so I've had a couple chances to use this and it definitely does the trick. As some of the other reviews noted, there is a smell but for me, it's not as strong as I was expecting from some of the reviews, and it's not unbearable, especially since I haven't been able to find one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: MIFan

customer_reviews.title: Smells like old tires
customer_reviews.text: I bought this plunger based on good reviews. I didn't need it at the moment, but one needs to have a plunger handy for the few times you do need it. It looked okay, so I put it in a little used storage closet. When I opened the closet weeks later. The area smelled like old tires. I soaked the plunger in a cleaning solution but it still smells like old rubber. I now store it outside. Would never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: RenoGal

customer_reviews.title: no thank you
customer_reviews.text: arrived but looked like it was used with scratches all over the rubber base portion. so either it's made very cheaply or this was a return from someone else. either way. i cannot recommend this brand. also had a sticker on the label but not the kind that easily comes off. and it's not my job to scrape a label off for 20 minutes after buying someones product. i changed it for a new brand, one that was made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer # 97,427,916

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: Not the most glamorous purchase I have made but it saved me a plumbing bill. I bought my condo a few months ago and when my son would use his bathroom the toilet would flush slow and we would hear a weird sound in the pipes. Over time it finally clogged and we tried every trick known to mankind to unstop it.. which worked but shortly it clogged again. After the first clog I ordered this and had it ready. I had my teen son go on youtube to figure out how to use it and BAM first time it worked, sounds in pipes stopped and no more clogs!
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know there were differences in plungers
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know it was possible to buy a "good plunger" until today. Every plunger I have used in the past pulls the blockage you are trying to clear back into the toilet bowl. This means that you see stuff you were hoping never to see again and the plunger itself requires a type of cleaning you never wanted to do. It took two or three tries, but when I used this plunger it pushed the blockage out rather than pulling it back in. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: jmarie0315

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have live in my house for over five years. The toilets have never been that great. Recently one of them got to the point of no return, so we replaced it. Almost right away it too started to clog so we figured there was a bigger problem. I ordered this plunger hoping for it to get us far enough to when we were ready to call a plumber. Well, we haven't had to! It did the job! We haven't had one issue since we got this grand little thing. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Finally the right tool for my job
customer_reviews.text: BA BUM! POOP GONE! I couldn't get rid of those pesky turds. I have the curious case of the leaky butt. There is always brown coming out of it. I went to the doctor, but didn't ask them. I got nervous. Anyway, this leaky butt leads to some backups in the toilette department. Normally, with old plungers I had to pump the poop out like an antique steam engine. My arms achy and tired I would collapse back only to see more water and more brown filling to the brim. But this plunger has never failed me. So long poop, so long disappointment, so long to the devil in my toilette.
customer_reviews.author: amazonadict1234

customer_reviews.title: wonderful, Does the job easier than others !
customer_reviews.text: I was having to plunge everyday and it was taking a half hour, i had 2 other plungers i was uses and they just couldn't do the job. I decided it would be worth it to spend a little more and try to be a nicer plunger .So glad i did because this is the best one i have ever used ! it truly does work as described, much better than the 2 i had in the bathroom they would take forever to unplug, this one works in just a few plunges. Who know a plunger could be so exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Jortney

customer_reviews.title: Is it wrong to love a plunger?
customer_reviews.text: First of all, we are seniors, and one of us has a disability... Without getting graphic, we were down to one toilet until this beast arrived! We had tried everything, and yes, we own a plunger- NOTHING WORKED! This was our last try before calling a plumber. Let me just say this, if this company sells any other product, I will buy it, if it is this good. We have a strange shaped toilet drain??? Anyway, this sealed and worked like a charm and I think I like it second only to my Ipad that I got for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Sher Doxzon

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: It lives up to all the positive reviews on Amazon. I’m recommending it to friends whose toilet flushes have very little “water power”. I’d thrown out the old heavy one - the rubber had become stiff and provided zero compression and suction. Treat yourself to this model. Honestly, it’s nimble and moves stuff down the drain. What a relief.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Martenson

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT! Fits my toilet better than other plungers
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT! Fits my toilet better than other plungers. It is light and made of high-quality materials - aluminum and rubber. Note: for most of my clogs, pulling (i.e., sucking) at the clog often works better than pushing at it. And it usually avoids splashing water onto the floor: -- Submerge the plunger so that it is covered in water. -- Try to get as much air out of the plunger as possible. -- Slowly push the plunger in as far as it will go. Make sure it is seated well. -- Pull-out on the plunger to try to dislodge the clog. -- Repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: poop
customer_reviews.text: doesn't fit toilet correctly... splashes turd water all over bathroom.... does jack on the clog.... 5.00 kmart plunger worked better with less mess
customer_reviews.author: J. montagna

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 2014 but we quickly realized this wasn’t as effective or easy to use as the good old standard ones. The plunger head isn’t large enough and we have to try many angles, many times to get it to work. Last night we could only find this one, post move, and it took us 20 awful minutes. I’m online today to buy 3 more plungers and they won’t be this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andey K

customer_reviews.title: Better than the old fashioned kind...
customer_reviews.text: I had the old fashioned wood handled kind. After a while, that one started to smell, get hard, was hard to use, and who wants to touch the wood handle of a plunger. This one is clean, easy to keep clean, looks good, works great, and doesn't cost much. Everything a plunger, should be, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy S

customer_reviews.title: Just ok . . . Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: My old plunger works just as same. Nothing special. I have one toilet that constantly clogs and thought this would work better and be more forceful than old plunger. Old and new work the same and both require numerous attempts and much effort to unclog. If u do not need a new plunger then don’t bother buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: MLM1

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me when other plungers failed
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a house and one of the toilets got clogged. I tried using the plunger that the previous owner left, but it just couldn't remove the clog. I ordered this plunger, and in about 5-10 seconds of use it had removed the clog and my toilet was working again. I'm very pleased with the price and performance of this item. It has several different sizes at the suction end of the plunger, so it should fit most toilets (the increasing diameter of the plunger is in steps, so it collapses like an accordion when you compress the plunger and seals both small or large toilet drains)
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Cleared a toilet that had been blocked for a week!
customer_reviews.text: We have two toilets in our house, which is a mobile home. Each of the two toilets in the bathrooms have different size and shaped drain openings and the plunger which works in one does not seal properly in the other. In total frustration I read all the reviews on the various plungers and decided on the Neiko. After just a few plunges the block cleared and the beautiful sound of flushing water was heard in that bathroom for the first time in a week. This a well made and well engineered produck.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lamovsky

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. We have two plungers that we bought that couldn’t get a simple clog out. We returned those and decided to give this a try. Omg! Every single clog we had this does the job within seconds. We’ve never had a clog that we couldn’t unclog after getting this.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Worry no more!
customer_reviews.text: Do you like buffets? Maybe all you can eat sushi is your deal. You wanna mac out on food. But then you think, well my toilet may not be able to handle the aftermath and my plunger is puny and weak. WELL WORRY NO MORE! With this bad boy, you can hit up all those buffets with ease in your mind knowing that this is waiting for you, backing you up at home! When you have this, a little voice will say to you "i will always have your back!". With this, all your troubles just float away!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: In all my years I've never used a plunger like this one. The kind they sell at stores just don't compare. The handle is sturdy but lightweight, and the accordion style at the bottom makes it so easy. I was so tired of all our plungers always inverting while plunging. This one doesn't do that and it's SO much less work to unclog the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Smarah

customer_reviews.title: There's got to be a better plunger somewhere
customer_reviews.text: Most standard toilets don't have round drain openings. To free a clogged drain line the plunger need to create a downward air pressure. This item sends water on my bathroom floor with every downward thrust. Not impressed and wish I could return the two I bought but who wants to take back a used plunger?
customer_reviews.author: JoeC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bomb! Or perhaps the evacuator. I don't go to the bathroom very often, but when I do it's a nice sized movement. I would compare it to babies arm. Well, one week I was extra active, thanks to some fiber gummies. I managed to clog two toilets and the crappy plunger I had, did nothing to help (see what I did there?). I ordered this and had it in two days. I was skeptical at first, but this thing did the job. It was quick, easy and painless! Thank you Neiko 60166A!
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a tiny garage apartment with tiny plumbing to match. I suspect the toilet is one of those "reduced flow" products that actually makes you use MORE water because you have to flush 2-3 times to get everything to go down the hatch. This plunger has been a godsend. It really works. I had a regular plunger that I used before, almost took my arm out with all the work I had to do with it. But this plunger clears everything out with just one plunge, sometimes only two. Thank you, thank you! My arm is healing, too!
customer_reviews.author: Joaninha

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with minimal effort
customer_reviews.text: To me, the most important question is... Does this work. Unequivocally, the answer is yes. I now own 3 of these (all working). Clearly, I would buy again. By the way, totally decided against pictures because, well, before and after pictures are kinda inappropriate.
customer_reviews.author: HizAwesomeness

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work as Well For Oval Shaped Toilet Flush Holes
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure your hole is the right shape. Oval holes have some trouble, so it won't generally work well for them. It seems to be designed for circle-shaped flush holes. The suction simply doesn't apply well with oval holes.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great, Works Perfectly, Bought Mine for $15.70
customer_reviews.text: I like my new plunger! Used it only once and noticed right off the bat that it plunges well, very well, much better than my previous plunger. I might even use this for my kitchen sink when it stops up again! The smell that is mentioned in other review is NOTHING to worry about! Have you ever purchased a new tire for your car? This plunger rubber smells just like the wonderful rubber smell of new auto tires! I thoroughly enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: hotdogwill

customer_reviews.title: Little guy did a great job
customer_reviews.text: Total life saver or the call to a plumber.. After spending $35.00, and my plunger not working this time I needed help; after an hour or so going over plungers and reviews this one was picked. It came fast (thank goodness), however, a little sceptical at the size, I plunged right in and after a few plunges my toilet burped and all was gone. Well, except cleaning up. Thank you plunger and Thank you Amazon for products and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Antie Gale, Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Plunger
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small plunger and does NOT "Do The Job". My toilet is still stopped up after multiple attempts using this. It's no better than the plunger I bought from the local grocery store. I thought this was gonna be a Boss plunger but it's bad enough that I had to leave a review. If you read this, look for another plunger. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Just a run-of-the-mill plunger with a metal handle
customer_reviews.text: Forget all the hype. This is a toilet plunger that works the same as one you can buy for 5 bucks almost anywhere. I like the metal handle but that's about all I like about this. It does not seal well in the toilet. Each plunge shoots geysers of water in any direction. After a vigorous session of plunging it leaves black marks all around the toilet drain which must be scoured later. It may work better in some other toilets, but I have three that are identical and it works poorly in all of them. I had hoped that for the price that this would somehow be a better plunger than all the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Just JimTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Super effective against cat litter flushed-down the toilet by "the help"
customer_reviews.text: My mother has had a few different carers over time, and one decided that flushing an entire cat box full of used cat litter down a toilet was a good idea. Needless to say, the toilet got supremely blocked by this. Luckily, this plunger was up to the challenge of unblocking the sewer line! A few really hard extraction motions with the plunger cleared the sewer line perfectly. If I hadn't give my mom this sturdy plunger when her last one bit the dust, I'd have never cleared the blockage. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G

customer_reviews.title: THE MARVELOUS POO-UNCLOGGER!
customer_reviews.text: OK - all jokes aside, my daughter clogs the toilet EVERY TIME she goes #2. She's 6.... don't know where it comes from! Also, it doesn't matter which of the three toilets she uses.... we had a plunger already but we wanted another one to keep downstairs. Lo and behold.. this got delivered and later that night, clogged toilet. Did what I usually do with a plunger and OMG THIS THING UNCLOGGED THE TOILET LIKE THERE'S NO TOMORROW! Can't wait to use it again LOL
customer_reviews.author: kcwojtowicz

customer_reviews.title: Keep one by each toilet!
customer_reviews.text: My older toilet has an irregular shaped drain hole, and I'd plunged a hundred times to no avail. Second plunge with this soft/flexible plunger, and it back-sucked up (due to it's good seal) a dead mouse that had apparently fallen in! Must have been in the trap just out of sight! Problem solved--whew--what a relief! Saved a plumber's visit! Told my brother about this (who has B&B's) and he ordered a bunch of them! One improvement suggestion: get rid of the hanging hook at the end and replace it with a smooth/soft wider "knob" tip so it's more comfortable on the hand! What's the point of a swivel hook on a symmetrical item?--Nonsense!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sue

customer_reviews.title: Is it okay to love a plunger??
customer_reviews.text: The house we're in has rather small toilets, and they clog regularly. The previous, standard plunger we had finally cracked. It would often take 20 or more plunges to do the job. The first time I used this one, and I mean the first plunge, the clog was cleared. In the last 3 months, it's never taken more than a few plunges to do the job. The plunger fits multiple sized toilets, so it makes a good seal and, therefore, does its job.
customer_reviews.author: bard

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a sink plunger and it works great!I
customer_reviews.text: I already had a good toilet plunger, but needed one for the sinks. Good design. Blasts right through. Very sturdy. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: fmt

customer_reviews.title: The LONG Handles: You'll LOVE this feature
customer_reviews.text: HOw do you write a review about a plunger...hm..well, let's start by saying it does the job and does it much better than the cheapy plungers from the local hardware store, so, I'm very happy that it does the job and the best thing THE LONG HANDLES!!!!!! YES! This is a win-win. There is NOTHING worse than splash back so the handles solve this issue for me. I would buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: jbar2000

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power and effective
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully this hasn't had to see much use for the 3+ years since bought. There was one incident which I loaned it out to a neighbor who used their plunger for an hour or more to try to clear a clog to no avail. After about 5 mins of using this one, the water was flowing again and it opemed the clog enough to get the toilet working again. For that alone winning a head to head battle against another design, I'm going to say well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: It simply works.  One of best purchases on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works and anybody whining about the aethestics, handle on end forget the purpose. I had a clog that NOTHING could resolve. I ordered this out of desperation as the next step was to call a plumber and get corn h*#*ed. 5 plunges and bam, the water swirls magically down the drain. Couple days later, and 45 minutes on the John and a reach around to flush was not met by the drainage swoosh. I was almost happy. One plunge and success. Why does it work? It forms a good seal and pushed a lot of water with each plunge. There also is no backsplash with each retraction of the plunger. It works.
customer_reviews.author: DaveB

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: I think these plungers are worth what we paid for them. The metal handle isn't the strongest but they work well so there hasn't been an issue where they've bent like I had read in other reviews. I paid just as much for one at Home Depot and it lasted a couple months before the rubber cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Lvnintem

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy in the places you need it to be rigid and rigid where you'd want it to adapt to the shape of the drain. Overall, not really a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction
customer_reviews.text: It took me three pumps to unclog my toilet. I was amazed that it was that easy. Nice sturdy handle. The aluminum handle is more sanitary than a wooden one. Great suction. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Strong, light weight, high quality- does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This plunger is very strong but light weight and it’s easy to maneuver. It quickly and efficiently gets the job done. I bought this after I was super frustrated with my old plunger. I have two different styles of toilets in my home and a standard plunger wasn’t working on my new compact model. I’m very happy with this purchase. Great price for high quality. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JennyWren

customer_reviews.title: Use it properly, and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I don't like about this plunger. (It WAS a challenge to get a video, though!) Some people are not aware that, in order to obtain a seal, the handle needs to be held at a slight angle until the opening is covered, then push slightly to make a seal, then by pumping about 8-10 times, the suction does the rest... voilà!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Zuehl

customer_reviews.title: Unclogging Lives One Push At A Time
customer_reviews.text: This thing here is a beast of a plunger. It seals off the toilet bowl with ease, and provides a powerful pump once pushed down. The only downside to this is the cheap aluminum type o' handle. It is still intact and functioning, but I am not sure this will last more than 50 uses in battle.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: This plunger is awesome. It suctions very well so when I pull it it helps to unclog toilet. So happy with this. Don’t need to use too much strength
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has fixed everything from my toilet, kitchen sink, bathroom sink and even my shower drain!!! I used to think all plungers were built alike. No longer!!! This one has the magic touch. Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Power plunger that works on different sized holes; excellent suction power.
customer_reviews.text: This plunger is da bomb! We have old pipes, and the person who installed our shower dropped a bunch of grout down the drain making frequent backups a problem. I have used this plunger on two types of toilets, the shower and the tub, and it really works magically. This device is amazing. It works on different sized holes, and has excellent suction power.
customer_reviews.author: maddox

customer_reviews.title: Needs hand grips or flat top for pushing...
customer_reviews.text: Great plunger, pushes lots of water with every push. Would have given 5/5 stars if had a flat top so that you can push down from the top for maximum force. Since you have to grip this like a push broom, your hands sometimes slide down the white handle...it really needs grips or something.
customer_reviews.author: Sigmax

customer_reviews.title: Squirted from the bottom handle upward in my eyes.
customer_reviews.text: When I use the plunger water it squirted upward from the opening of the handle where the handle means the rubber. Beware and protect of your eyes when using this plunger.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Messimeri

customer_reviews.title: Works every time.
customer_reviews.text: Using a crappy plunger can turn an unpleasant experience into a nasty disaster. This plunger is the best defense against that kind of disaster. You don't ever want to use a plunger, but if circumstances require it, you want one that actually does the job. This design is simple, but very sturdy. It seals well and doesn't flip backwards on itself like others can. It works much better than anything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: R. McMullin

customer_reviews.title: A little more expensive than the standard alternative but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the best plunger I have ever used anywhere. With five toilets in the house and a large family of varying ages and genders, a good plunger is essential. I finally have found mine.
customer_reviews.author: fanofhistory

customer_reviews.title: As good as reviewed!
customer_reviews.text: I take most reviews with a grain of salt but this plunger earns it. It’s the best plunger I’ve ever used. It’s fast and efficient, clears a plugs so quick it’s crazy. Very good seal. My only complain is the label does not remove easily, so it leaves a residue behind. Other than that this thing is damn near perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: BEST. PLUNGER. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I have photos but I will spare you!!! Best plunger hands down lol this was my LAST resort before I called the plumber as my toilet had been clogged for over a week (we have 2 other bathrooms) and I was at my wits end. Turns out I didn't need a plumber only a good plunger! Hallelujah! Literally 4 pumps and I heard the blockage clear. Saved me 100s I'm sure!
customer_reviews.author: Erikita

customer_reviews.title: FASTER AND CHEAPER THAN A PLUMBER
customer_reviews.text: I have an elongated TOILET that was plugged by a super poop. My old plunger did not work to clear the obstruction. Ordered this plunger at 11AM, which was delivered at 730PM the same day. After a few minutes, the toilet was properly running again. With Amazon fast same day delivery and the quality and effectiveness of the plunger, this problem was quickly resolved. In short, faster and cheaper than a plumber!
customer_reviews.author: MASSELINK

customer_reviews.title: Look no more
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast ! It doesnt take me more than 2 plunges and boom its unclogged, so much faith in this brand and plunger ! Great company and amazing plunger ! I had to buy 1 more because everyone kept taking it to use in the other bathroom. For the price ? Perfect ! Look no further for a affordable and great working product.
customer_reviews.author: westlee burton

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to clog the toilet to use this bad boy. I finally accomplished that and was able to implement this new plunger. One pump and it was gone. Works well. Well made. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around plunger
customer_reviews.text: I researched for a while about plungers and came across this one as one of the best. For a traditional toilet (We have 3 different toilets in our home all different sizes) It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't push much volume at each push, but it does seal fairly good. The end of the handle is not well designed, so I turned a replacement one in wood which works a lot better and is much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wagon Willie

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a nerd, but this is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I had a crappy plunger before. No pun intended. The thing would not suction and would constantly flip inside out. Shows you get what you pay for! I have never had an issue with this one in the least. Works well and gets the job done quickly. Before I got it, I thought I was just horrible at using plungers. Nope. All in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my oddly shaped toilet
customer_reviews.text: I used the plunger to clear a toilet paper blockage that was preventing the bowl from draining. The plunger's design allowed me to come at the outlet from several different angles. Best feature is that "bell" head is articulated in such a way as to allow the generation of a great deal of force. I did not rate the plunger very high for clean up, but the a characteristic of all plungers. The handle is metal and that cleans off much better than wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this plunger it works great to get the job done decided on getting this one to replace my other one I was using to wash my cloth diapers with (bucket and plunger method) the old one only lasted 4 months before falling apart (standard wood handle and rubber end) this new one works great and is holding up well being used 2-3× a week No I have not used it to clear any drains so I don't know how well it works for that but if I ever have a need to replace the one for the potty I will be getting another one of these
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mama

customer_reviews.title: This thing is MIRACULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: I’m one of those people who know how to “properly” plunge a toilet. But, even when I get the standard plunger with a cup correct placed, multiple variables could make this hard. Well not with THIS one. It works fast and throughly. every. single. time! I thought I was imagining it but after a few months of use, I know I’m not. I no longer dread a clogged toilet—especially with my low-flush, slow refilling toilet with a funny shaped hole!
customer_reviews.author: DMCReports

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: works great. I have oval toilets and couple of times of use it fits well and plunges fast revolutions to unstop. doesn't collapse and turn inside out as older simple red plunger. I don't put my palm on top. just grap and go fast up and down. then flush. then flush again to clean. easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: FrankieBoy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This plunger actually works. Always bought cheap ones from the store and was tired of plunging a toilet for 30 min. Clears the clog pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Nebmom

customer_reviews.title: This product sucks...in a good way
customer_reviews.text: This is our second of this item we have ordered. The first has worked on a couple of occasions when it's been necessary. This latest addition has not been inaugurated as of yet and I hope it will be awhile. But, it's useful to have a couple so that you don't have to chase around looking for in which of the other two bathrooms the first is stationed. So, for the price, having two is a luxury. And, good for guests to find if they would otherwise have reason to be embarrassed. "I just clogged up your toilet with that gross appetizer you're serving."
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Bamberger

customer_reviews.title: Oh Yeah, It Plunges!
customer_reviews.text: Got a Toto toilet? Get this plunger. Most plungers work pretty well since most toilets have a round hole, but the Toto toilets have a square hole and getting a good suction on it is super challenging. A plumber recommended this plunger and bam, he was right! Sucked that plugged toilet right out! As other reviewers noted, the handle it pretty flimsy feeling, but it works!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems clearing a toilet using our old plunger and bought this one based on its reviews. I used it as soon as it arrived and it cleared the toilet right away. Also, the ends did not roll over once, which was something our old plunger did constantly--no more sore shoulders and back.
customer_reviews.author: jls7288

customer_reviews.title: my kid... *smh* 13 year old that ...
customer_reviews.text: my kid... *smh* 13 year old that has been clogging toilets since he was 5-- toilets that don't clog when anyone else uses them; friend's houses, parents', wherever-- but when I bought this one for him to de-clog with, he said it make it much easier to get everything working again. I haven't used it, but he's kinda an expert--- I made him start taking care of these things himself about 3 years ago after i got tired of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nacho Libre

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Our toilet is at a very strange angle - I thought all toilet drains were centered and going straight down. Not the case! Ours is angled weird, causing ALL OTHER plungers to be ineffective. We have been through four different plungers since living here (we just moved in a couple months ago), and NONE of them have worked sufficiently at all. It's been such a waste of money and time. We are very pleased with our purchase, because it's the only plunger that has effectively unclogged our toilet! It's easy to use and really works at those odd angles. So thankful! I was getting sick of buying new plungers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower Meadow

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd Known About This Plunger Years Ago...EVERY HOUSEHOLD NEEDS ONE
customer_reviews.text: Someone in my house doesn't eat enough fruit/fiber and uses too much toilet paper. This plunger sorted out a blocked Kohler Cimarron in no time at all. On a previous occasion the plumber had to snake it clear. Our recently installed Kohler Santa Rosa was blocked by the same user but thankfully that unblocked by pouring a bucket of water down to trigger the "big gulp". I'm sure that, if needed in the future, this plunger would be able to seal and work on the Santa Rosa also.
customer_reviews.author: McLaren

customer_reviews.title: The only toilet plunger you'll ever need.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent plunger and the two-pack is a great deal for anyone with two or more bathrooms. Plungers work on a vacuum sealing principle, so they pretty much either work great or not at all. This one works great, so buy it. When you need a working plunger, you really need one; spending a little more for a quality product like this will save you a lot of time and money versus hiring a plumber or cleaning up a nasty mess from your bathroom floor.
customer_reviews.author: JoBob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BEST plunger EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Honestly - just WOW!!! This thing is so awesome! I had the plunger that always inverted itself and you had to fix by pulling against the rim of the toilit. This plunger NEVER does that! It is super sturdy and one plunge and done! Never an issue with anything!!! BEST EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as simple as it gets
customer_reviews.text: Can't get any better than this. No need for any fancy plunger when you can just use one of these and unclog your toilet in just a few seconds. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: W.L.

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased two other plunges at stores nearby and they worked horribly. This plunger really is different. After plunging our toilet off an on for months with other plungers and getting temporary results, I used this and the toilet hasn't backed up again. This is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: G34

customer_reviews.title: Never spend 20min fixing your mistake
customer_reviews.text: It's borderline embarrassing dealing with a toilet clog that you created for over 20 minutes. As a lifelong number 2 goer, I ran into many issues with the common plunger. Including the black ones were the actual suction cup becomes inverted and thus useless. Or the normal brick colored ones that basically are there for looks sake only. This plunger with a handle takes about 1 to 2 plunges for any situation I've got myself into. It's literally saved me minutes upon minutes of my life in a whole lot of embarrassment. This is a man's plunger for man.. dilemmas
customer_reviews.author: Biggrlgazer

customer_reviews.title: It's a plunger. It does what plungers do... but with EFFICIENCY!
customer_reviews.text: It's a plunger. It does what plungers do... but with EFFICIENCY! I've got some kids that no matter how many times I tell them their bottoms aren't that big, insist on flushing miles of t.p. down the toilet. I got tired of working out with the old plunger so I broke down and spent the $12 on this bad boy! It's been worth every penny. I also purchased the plunger drip tray for $8.
customer_reviews.author: ofgoodcheer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had to use this in the tub and toilet and like the suction, plus the rubber doesn't fold back like the cheaper ones do. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tory Richards

customer_reviews.title: It works but splashes
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a plunger except if it works or not. So, yes, this one works. To an extent. Here’s the thing, it splashed water all over the place unless the water level in the bowl is low to none. The only plunger that has ever successfully suctioned without splash was the plasti type that looks like an accordion along the neck of the handle. That would be the only kind I could honestly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BinaryCode

customer_reviews.title: OMG it works!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly, this little gem is 100% effective! Magical and worth every penny. Follow-up: This has saved me hundreds of dollars in plumbers' fees. How did I live without it?
customer_reviews.author: CarolLBKindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet plunger
customer_reviews.text: I have been through so many different plunger's and have never found one that was perfect until now. This is a very sturdy plunger and gets the job done. It is well made and seems to suction better than any others that I have had. I think it is worth the price to buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: toadswife

customer_reviews.title: I took the plunge...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the last plunger I had because the seal around the handle and the rubber were bad and it was not getting a good seal for pressure. I found this plunger and it turned my crappy situation into a better one. It seals nice and the rubber is rigid and soft enough at the same time, to allow for easy plunging without a ton of effort. Hope it helps you with your crappy situations too!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Macarone

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a plunger that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This plunger actually works! I am here buying another one for my second bathroom. Who knew that it would be so difficult to find a decent plunger? I have probably bought something like 10 plungers that all failed to plunge in some way. However, this one actually does the job.
customer_reviews.author: checkers

product_meta.title: Neiko 60166A Toilet Plunger with Patented All-Angle Design | Heavy Duty | Aluminum Handle
product_meta.description: Size:1-PackThis is the perfect plunger for any home owner. Super-pliable industrial-rubber cup with tiered ridges forms ultra-tight seal on any size drain. Heavy-duty aluminum handle allows for maximum pressure forced to alleviate the source of clogging. Designed to work effectively at any angle for hard-to-reach, low-clearance applications.
feature_bullets: Unique 4-step heavy duty graduated suction cup fits securely in all different types and sizes of toilet drain openings
Light weight, rustproof, and mold resistant aluminum handle with peg hole for convenient hanging
Super pliable and durable rubber cup creates an ultra tight seal around the drain from all angles for commercial or residential use
Special cup design never flips back and gets stuck like other comparative plungers
Smooth edge and bottom design without interior ridges prevents toilet water from remaining inside cup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,928 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
